articles.title: Tesla e il volante a cloche: è legale?
articles.description: La NHTSA sta valutando l'effettiva legalità del controverso volante a cloche montato su Model S 2021 e Model X 2021; al momento non si hanno certezze.
articles.content: La NHTSA – National Highway Traffic Safety Administration – ha recentemente rilasciato un nuovo commento riguardante la legalità del controverso design dello sterzo introdotto su Tesla Model S e Tesla Model X MY 2021; infatti i due modelli sono stati... [1801 chars]

articles.title: Auto Tesla, Brebemi: da marzo esordio delle ricariche rapide
articles.description: Con l’inaugurazione del "Supercharger", l’autostrada A35 si conferma la più green d’Italia
articles.content: Il Tesla Supercharger è operativo dal 4 marzo nelle stazioni di servizio Adda Nord e Adda Sud della A35 Brebemi-Aleatica, permettendo alle iconiche auto del brand californiano di ricaricarsi in circa 30 minuti. Con una potenza di picco di 250 kW, inf... [1379 chars]

articles.title: CarPlay dans une Model 3, c’est possible en bricolant un peu
articles.description: Tesla est l’un des rares constructeurs qui ne propose pas CarPlay dans ses voitures. C’est un choix de la part du constructeur exclusivement électrique qui privilégie son propre système et sa propre interface, plutôt que de faire de la place à Apple ou Google sur les écrans tactiles de ses véhicules. Si CarPlay vous manque vraiment dans votre Model 3 ou Model Y, il existe une

articles.title: Elon Musk loses $35b as historic wealth gains unravel
articles.description: The Tesla CEO’s net worth still places him second on the Bloomberg Billionaires Index, but he’s now a long way behind Amazon’s Jeff Bezos.
articles.content:
Elon Musk set records last year for one of the fastest streaks of wealth accumulation in history. The reversal is under way, and it’s steep.
The Tesla chief executive officer lost $US27 billion ($35 billion) last week as shares of the car maker tumbl... [1206 chars]

articles.title: Chinese Electric Cars Are Poised to Take Over the Market
articles.description: Chinese electric vehicles have made enormous strides, and they are now poised to take on Tesla.
articles.content:
Back in the 1970s and 1980s, Japanese-made cars, such as those from Honda and Nissan, disrupted the American auto market. The same thing might be happening again soon within the electric car market, only this time, the cars are coming from China.
In ... [4976 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk lost $27 billion last week
articles.description: Elon Musk's net worth plunged last week as tech stocks got hammered and Tesla shares' stunning rise quickly unraveled.
articles.content: Wall Street is growing increasingly nervous about rising bond yields, which could make borrowing more expensive. That could eat into corporate profits, which is why investors have begun to reverse some of the positions they took over the past year in... [1731 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk says Tesla is expanding its Full Self Driving beta to more drivers
articles.description: Tesla is expanding the "Full Self-Driving" (FSD) beta it launched in October, according to CEO Elon Musk. Tesla plans to double the size of the beta test pool and eventually increase the number of vehicles in the beta tenfold.
articles.content:
Tesla is expanding its “Full Self-Driving” (FSD) beta, CEO Elon Musk said, doubling its size with a new software update, and eventually increasing the number of participants tenfold.
“Still be careful, but it’s getting mature,” Musk tweeted Friday. H... [1336 chars]

articles.title: Tesla is about to unveil an updated Cybertruck, Elon Musk says
articles.description: It's been more than a year since Tesla unveiled the first version of its electric Cybertruck, but Tesla CEO Elon Musk said an updated version of the car might be coming soon.
articles.content:
New York (CNN Business) More than a year since Tesla unveiled the first version of the Cybertruck, the company has been mostly silent about plans for its highly anticipated electric pickup.
But CEO Elon Musk said an updated version of the Cybertruck ... [1145 chars]

articles.title: Tesla-Aktie stürzt ab: Gründer Elon Musk irrtümlich für tot erklärt
articles.description: Am Freitag überschlugen sich auf Twitter die Nachrichten darüber, dass Tesla-Gründer Elon Musk angeblich verstorben sei. Dies stellte sich jedoch als Falschmeldung heraus.
articles.content:
Köln -
Am Freitag (5. März) ist die Tesla-Aktie in den Keller gestürzt. Der Grund dafür war vor allem die über Twitter vermeldete Falschmeldung vom Tod des Tesla-Gründers Elon Musk. Dieser soll bei einem Unfall verstorben sein, hieß es. Dabei erfreut... [3747 chars]

articles.title: Cathie Wood Has a New Tesla Target Price Soon. Here's Where It Might Be.
articles.description: ARK Investment founder Cathie Wood says her new Tesla price target is coming soon. What will it be? Barron's hazards a back-of-the-envelope guess.
articles.content:
Text size
Tech disruption guru and ARK Investment founder Cathie Wood says her firm will put out a new price target for Tesla stock soon. No one knows exactly when, but when it arrives it will be a big deal for Tesla fans.
